snippet: Periodically throughout the Olympics, we checked in with Dennis Spurr, the owner of the Fantastic Sausage Factory in Weymouth, a pretty town on the English coast where the sailing events took place. On the final day of the Games, Spurr is worn out.
abstract: Periodically throughout the Olympics, we checked in with Dennis Spurr, the owner of the Fantastic Sausage Factory in Weymouth, a pretty town on the English coast where the sailing events took place. On the final day of the Games, Spurr is worn out.

headline.main: The Beginning of Back to Normal
headline.print_headline: Weymouth Journal: The Beginning Of Back to Normal
